page.title: 18Traffic Counts (M18,B6060)
page.content: On the 20th of June 1985 we did a traffic count on the M18 and on the road outside our school.We counted the traffic in a fifteen minute period. We found out that 50% of the traffic on the motorway were cars.On the B6060 (the road outside our school) it was 74%. We found that 38% of the traffic on the motorway were lorries.On the B6060 it was 6%.Of the traffic on the motorway 9% were vans and on the B6060 there were 15%.More of the traffic on the motorway was lorries than on the B6060 because on the motorway lorries are taking heavy goods a long way.It is also easier and faster for them.The large percentage of lorries on the motorways means that cars and buses and other traffic cover a smaller percentage.Much of the traffic on the B6060 was smaller vehicles.
